name: The Mask of Sar-Lakhmu
description:
Made for LOWREZJAM 2022 in two weeks.

King Lothar of Castle Torsten has enlisted you to retrieve an ancient artefact: The Mask of Sar-Lakhmu from the abandoned tunnels under his castle. Many have tried and failed, but The King seems to trust in your skills. Along the way you will collect gems which grant you unique powers.

Default resolution is 64x64, as per LOWREZJAM's rules, but you can optionally play with higher resolutions and textures turned on (shown in the screenshots).

Controls:

  • E - Interact (Open doors, chests etc.)
  • WASD - Move
  • Left-click - Attack
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Esc - Open settings menu

This project is pretty sloppy and unfinished. I wanted to do a lot more originally, and probably will continue making it after the jam. I have made a first area, with a boss battle, and started making a second area, just to preview the main enemy in that area.

Linux and Mac builds not tested.
